title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Boil the spaghetti. In another pan, fry the onion and garlic, then add the beef. Cook until browned. Add the tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes. Serve over spaghetti.

title: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Grill the chicken and slice it. Toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing, top with chicken, croutons, and Parmesan.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook the ground beef in a pan with taco seasoning. Assemble the tacos by adding the beef, onion, tomato, lettuce, cheese, and sour cream to the taco shells.

title: Pancakes
instructions: Mix all the ingredients into a smooth batter. Heat a non-stick pan and cook pancakes until golden brown on both sides. Serve with syrup or toppings of your choice.

title: Caprese Salad
instructions: Layer the tomato and mozzarella slices on a plate. Add fresh basil leaves on top. Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar, and season with salt and pepper.
